    API documentation

    Module Description
    components.animation All classes dealing with using 3D skeletal animation
    components.assets Defines the static Assets class, a static class which manages all textures, meshes, materials, and animations.
    components.behavior Defines Behavior class, the base class for all scripts.
    components.camera Defines the Camera class, which manages a view and projection matrix.
    components.icomponent Defines the IComponent interface, which is the base for all components.
    components.lights TODO
    components.material Defines the Material and Texture classes.
    components.mesh Defines the Mesh class, which controls all meshes loaded into the world.
    components.userinterface Handles the creation and life cycle of UI objects and webview textures
    core.dgame Defines the DGame class, the base class for all game logic.
    core.gameobject Defines the GameObject class, to be subclassed by scripts and instantiated for static objects.
    core.prefabs Contains Prefabs and Prefab, manages creation and management of prefabs.
    core.properties Defines template mixins for defining properties in classes.
    core.reflection
    core.scene This module defines the Scene class, TODO
    graphics.adapters.adapter Contains all core code for the Graphics adapters, which is similar across all platforms
    graphics.adapters.linux TODO
    graphics.adapters.mac TODO
    graphics.adapters.win32 TODO
    graphics.shaders.glsl.ambientlight Lighting Pass shader for ambient lights
    graphics.shaders.glsl.animatedgeometry Geometry pash shader for bone-animated meshes. Uses standard Geometry fragment shader
    graphics.shaders.glsl.directionallight Lighting pass shader for Directional Lights
    graphics.shaders.glsl.geometry Geometry pass shader for standard meshes
    graphics.shaders.glsl.pointlight Lighting pass shader for Point Lights
    graphics.shaders.glsl.userinterface Post-Processing pass shader to render User Interfaces
    graphics.shaders.glsl
    graphics.shaders.shaders Defines Shader class and the Shaders collection for loading, binding, and setting values in GLSL shaders
    graphics.adapters
    graphics.graphics Container for the graphics adapter needed for the appropriate platform
    graphics.shaders
    utility.array
    utility.awesomium
    utility.concurrency Defines some useful helpers for running the engine concurrently.
    utility.config Defines the static class Config, which handles all configuration options.
    utility.filepath Defines the FilePath class, which stores default resource paths, and handles path manipulation.
    utility.input Defines the static Input class, which is responsible for handling all keyboard/mouse/controller interactions.
    utility.output Defines the static Output class, which handles all output to the console window.
    utility.string Defines utility functions for strings
    utility.tasks Defines methods for scheduling tasks with different conditions for executing.
    utility.time Defines the static Time class, which manages all game time related things.
    components
    core
    graphics
    utility
